code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{setTvKeyword}from"../../slices/TvShowSlice";import{fetchDetails}from"../../utils/utils";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import KeywordComponent from"../(utils)/KeywordComponent";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TvShowKeywords=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const{id}=useParams();useEffect(()=>{async function fetchDataFunction(){const result=await fetchDetails("tv/".concat(id,"/keywords"));dispatch(setTvKeyword(result));}fetchDataFunction();},[id,dispatch]);const tvKeywords=useSelector(state=>state.series.tvKeyword.data);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(KeywordComponent,{data:tvKeywords});};export default TvShowKeywords;
